1.4.1.name: wordpress/adminstrip
1.4.1.description: Adds a strip to the bottom of the screen for logged in admin users to allow quick access to popular parts on the Administration area in WordPress.<br/> Dashboard<br/> Logout<br/> Write<br/> Manage<br/> Options<br/> Akismet<br/> Mint (Disabled using comments)<br/> Number of posts and posts page<br/> Number of comments and comments page<br/> Number of categories and categories page<br/> Number of tags and tags page<br/> somefoolwitha.com
